title: Why no URF for April Fools day?
body: Will there be an urf mode coming out at any stage this year?

replies.body:
Urf will be in the new rotating queue.
It's already being tested on PBE, so it might be coming sooner than we think. You can find more information about it [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/announcing-rotating-game-mode-queue).

[April fools this year is Draven party :D](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/its-my-party-now)

yeah its what we all want right..... i love these Draven bobble heads...... as fucking if. i am gonna be seriously pissed if they dont have something big planned for the next couple of days cause if not i'm done. why would you take something everyone wants and give them a retarded fucking bobble head that is always looking at you.....
yeah 4 days later still no urf........... fuck you riot im done with league.
Agreed... Riot has defiantely got something up there sleeves...

So no UltraFire Rapid mode. My heart is sad. I took off work to play that mode with my friends and honestly was super disappointed it wasn't out. Anyways, I understand why they did this Draven thing. It was a prefect April fools, "got yea". Everyone expecting 'URF Mode' and then they do something totally different/terrible. You got me RIOT but it just sorta hurt. Kinda like when your best friend thinks it would be funny to pull the chair out underneath you but then you wind up breaking your tailbone and crying. I had money's saved up to buy skins to go hard on 'URF Mode' but I guess I'll just find something else to do with this time off.
how has no one figured out that Riot's been planning on having URF the whole time?  I mean, the whole this is so damn obvious (there's just more buildup this year)
lol it is not here yet though :(((((((((((((
Ok PHYL so.. why isnt it here yet?
The new rotating queue is so annoying, first we got the worst april fools joke and no urf and who knows what will be taken away next. Make League Great Again and bring back urf.

I wonder if they didnt do it to keep dynamic queue times lower... But people say all the time that they wish urf was year round. So if they flake on us and just do some stupid draven gig... People will flame. Plus no one even plays  Draven, ATLEAST do it for his brother Darius. People actually play  him! Idk if its just me but the the Draven minion heads make it weird to see their health bars. Especially on the cannons. The moral of the story here Riot is... BRING URF BACK!

#URForRIOT

I have been waiting so long to play URF!

On it's way in the form of the Rotating queue, which actually starts tomorrow (or in a couple days if you NA? I can't be f*cked looking up the time zone difference). It'll start with Ascension, but we'll still get plenty of URF from it.

Where is my urf mode. Seriously, 2 years straight i play that nonstop when it is around and it should have been here on the 31st. This is garbage. I like draven and play him often but even i think what you have done is here is stupid urf should have been here on the 31st. Ill say it again, garbage.

Dear Rito -.-,
we all are exited to play URF every year on april fools day and that is what we want... nobody likes draven or plays him actually...
pls bring us URF back ... did you see the sh*t strom ?? And where is the problem to bring URF live now ? Just poop on the rotation q .. we all just want to play URF -.-
Greatings
riot is is stupid wtf no urf . that is why people is quitting league stupid things like no Urf mode, he juggernauts update, and no Mana potion. Fuck Riot
